name: Twisty Wheel
description:
You may get hopelessly addicted to this wheel. Download right now if you dare.

How to Play

> Tap your screen to spin the wheel
> Match the arrow color with the color on the wheel
> Each level will require one additional color match to complete

Stay Connected
